Product Description: ['A mythic and emotionally charged hero’s journey, “Dune” tells the story of Paul Atreides, a brilliant and gifted young man born into a great destiny beyond his understanding, who must travel to the most dangerous planet in the universe to ensure the future of his family and his people. reference_summary:
Les Misérables (2012) [Blu-ray]
Hugh Jackman  (Actor),     Russell Crowe  (Actor),     Tom Hooper  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: Blu-ray
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, Blu-ray, Drama
['Hugh Jackman, Academy Award® winner Russell Crowe and Anne Hathaway star in this critically-acclaimed adaptation of the epic musical phenomenon. Set against the backdrop of 19th-century France, Les Misérables tells the story of ex-prisoner Jean Valjean (Jackman), hunted for decades by the ruthless policeman Javert (Crowe), after he breaks parole. When Valjean agrees to care for factory worker Fantine\'s (Hathaway) young daughter, Cosette, their lives change forever. This enthralling story is a timeless testament to the survival of the human spirit and "an unforgettable experience" (Richard Roeper, RichardRoeper.com).', 'Bonus Content:', 'Les Miserables: A Revolutionary Approach: The Stars of Les Misérable', 'Les Miserables: A Revolutionary Approach: The Stars of Les Misérable', 'Les Miserables: A Revolutionary Approach: The West End Connection', 'Les Miserables: A Revolutionary Approach: The West End Connection', 'Les Miserables: A Revolutionary Approach: Les Misérables on Location', 'Les Miserables: A Revolutionary Approach: Les Misérables on Location', 'Les Miserables: A Revolutionary Approach: Creating the Perfect Paris', 'Les Miserables: A Revolutionary Approach: Creating the Perfect Paris', 'Les Miserables: A Revolutionary Approach: Battle at the Barricade', 'Les Miserables: A Revolutionary Approach: Battle at the Barricade', 'Les Miserables: A Revolutionary Approach: Les Misérables Singing Live', 'Les Miserables: A Revolutionary Approach: Les Misérables Singing Live', "The Original Masterwork: Victor Hugo's Les Misérables", "The Original Masterwork: Victor Hugo's Les Misérables", 'Feature Commentary with Director Tom Hooper', 'Feature Commentary with Director Tom Hooper', ']]>']

Longmire: The Complete Sixth and Final Season (DVD)
Robert Taylor  (Actor),     Katee Sackhoff  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Drama
['Longmire: The Complete Sixth and Final Season (DVD)', 'Season Six of Longmire finds Sheriff Walt Longmire (Robert Taylor), his deputies Vic Moretti (Katee Sackhoff), and The Ferg (Adam Bartley), his best friend Henry Standing Bear (Lou Diamond Phillips), and daughter, Cady (Cassidy Freeman) facing the biggest personal and professional crises of their lives. Walt’s job and home are under threat by a powerful, but unscrupulous lawyer. Vic must decide what to do about her secret pregnancy. Ferg struggles to balance a new relationship with his commitment to his job. Cady is torn between her loyalties to dueling father figures. And Henry’s very life is in danger as an old nemesis is bent on revenge. With their world in turmoil, Walt and all the people he cares about most must ultimately face the most difficult decision of their lives: when is it time to pack it in, and when is it time to fight to the end?', ']]>']

Daredevil: The Complete Second Season
Royce Johnson  (Actor),     Deborah Ann Woll  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: Blu-ray
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, Blu-ray
['Marvel Comics\' "The Man Without Fear" comes to the small screen in this gritty and action-packed superhero series that debuted in 2015. By day, blind attorney Matt Murdock (Charlie Cox) helps the good people of New York City\'s Hell\'s Kitchen neighborhood with all their legal needs. By night, he uses his enhanced senses-the result of the accident that took his sight as a child-and exceptional fighting skills to battle all manner of criminal threats. Deborah Ann Woll, Elden Henson, Vincent D\'Onofrio, and Rosario Dawson also star.13 episodes on 4 discs. 11 3/4 hrs. Widescreen; Soundtrack: English. Region Free']
{'Aspect Ratio': '1.78:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '6.77 x 5.39 x 0.71 inches; 2.93 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'BUY0276701', 'Media Format': 'Import', 'Run time': '11 hours and 13 minutes', 'Release date': 'May 22, 2017', 'Actors': "Royce Johnson, Deborah Ann Woll, Elden Henson, Vincent D'Onofrio, Charlie Cox", 'Subtitles': 'German', 'Language': 'English (DTS 5.1)', 'Studio': 'ABC', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Blu-ray is my favorite media.  The picture is more vivid.  The series is like an action soap opera.  All the episodes follow one story line.  The production, writing, direction, acting, soundtrack and special effects are excellent.
Watch season one first to get the whole story.
Star Trek: The Next Generation: Season 2 [Blu-ray]
Michael Dorn  (Actor),     Marina Sirtis  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: Blu-ray
Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies
['Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season Two', 'travels warp speed into the next realm of adventure. Under the leadership of Captain Jean-Luc Picard (Patrick Stewart), the Enterprise faces a season of new changes and big challenges. With Dr. Crusher on sabbatical, Chief Medical Officer Katherine Pulaski (Diana Muldaur) fills in. And Guinan (Whoopi Goldberg) arrives as 10 Forward’s wise El-Aurian bartender. This voyage explores watershed moments, including Riker (Jonathan Frakes) experiencing the Klingon culture, Data (Brent Spiner) defending his humanity and the introduction of the Borg, a species of terrifying cybernetic conquerors threatening the fate of intelligent life. Presented for the first time on Blu-ray in 1080p high definition and digitally remastered 7.1 sound, this mission is not to be missed.']

profile:
**User Preferences Summary:**

- **Genre Preference:** The user continues to show a strong affinity for action, adventure, and intricate narratives, solidified by their recent engagement with notable science fiction titles featuring themes of destiny and conflict.

- **Format Choice:** Blu-ray remains the user's preferred format, underscoring their commitment to high-quality viewing experiences. Their latest acquisition reaffirms this choice, illustrating consistent brand loyalty and recognition of value in visual fidelity.

- **Content Appreciation:** The user values critically acclaimed productions with prominent actors and complex character dynamics. Their feedback highlights a preference for narratives that explore profound themes and emotional journeys, indicating thoughtful engagement with writing and direction.

- **Value Focus:** Quick delivery and competitive pricing are important to the user’s purchasing decisions. They embody loyalty to captivating titles within preferred genres, navigating format availability challenges to enrich their collection.

- **Review Behavior:** The user consistently offers high ratings and thoughtful feedback, reflecting satisfaction with their latest additions and an ongoing commitment to enhancing their collection.

- **Re-Engagement Intent:** The user's intent to explore captivating series is evident, demonstrating a resilient dedication to finding immersive viewing experiences despite previous setbacks. Their ongoing engagement suggests a desire for continued expansion in beloved genres, particularly in well-produced narratives.
